title: RGIPT Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline Junior Research Assistant Post
description: Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Petroleum Technology (RGIPT) has declared the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Junior Research Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech, M.E/ M.Tech, and M.Sc can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here, we mentioned more information about the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the RGIPT Recruitment 2025 .
